TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SCOPEDATAITEM extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Specifies items to be inserted into the scope pane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the SCOPEDATAITEM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies the number of enumerated items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Sets an MMC_CALLBACK value or a pointer to a null-terminated string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you use the <xref:Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IConsoleNameSpace2.InsertItem(Microsoft.CLRAdmin.SCOPEDATAITEM@)> or <xref:Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IConsoleNameSpace2.SetItem(Microsoft.CLRAdmin.SCOPEDATAITEM@)> methods, the displayname field must be set to MMC\_CALLBACK. When the name of the item that the console inserts changes, displayname can be set to MMC\_CALLBACK or a pointer to the null-terminated string constant that contains the item text.
For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies a console-supplied unique identifier for this instance of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies a user-supplied 32-bit value to associate with this instance of the structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The lParam field, also called a cookie, is the value that is passed as the first parameter to the <xref:Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IComponentData.QueryDataObject(System.Int32,System.UInt32,Microsoft.CLRAdmin.IDataObject@)> method.
For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies an array of flags indicating which members of this instance of the structure contain valid data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies the virtual image index in the image list when this instance of the structure is not selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies the virtual image index in the image list when this instance of the structure is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: Specifies the state mask for the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.summary: A console-supplied unique item identifier for this instance of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the <xref:Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.SCOPEDATAITEM> structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
